description: List commitments with filtering and pagination.
permissions: Admin users can view all commitments. Non-admin users can view commitments within policy scope where they have customer, broker, or trucker memberships matching the buyer or seller organization.
validation_notes: Status filter accepts: editing, active, inactive. broker/broker-id filters match commitments where buyer or seller is the given broker.

flags.name: --broker
flags.description: Filter by broker ID (matches buyer or seller broker). Example: --broker 123.
